extendedInfo.description: - Going out of office but need to log incoming calls?- On a Vacation and need a break from calls but want to attend them later?- Wish you had an answering machine within your smartphone?Turn your little green robot into an "Answering Machine"!!!And enjoy *your* time without disturbance.Features -- Minimalist Interface for easy usage- Continuous message reading mode- Different Recording mode (louder/system default)- Ring Delay added; now specify # of rings before receiving the call- Background Mode addedIf you have problem/ suggestion regarding the application please feel free to contact us.

reviews.title: HTC legend
reviews.comment: :( it is not picking any call. Its not working with my phone. Don\'t know whats going wrong with this. Plz fix this soon.
reviews.author: Samandeep Ralhan

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Looking for this kind of app but recording on loudspeaker and not going on mute are two issues that I think should be rectified.  THANKS anyway
reviews.author: Maneet Singh

reviews.title: Not working in micrmax a45
reviews.comment: It is best application concept but....its not working in Micromax a45 I think u need to fix this bug in another version .... :p
reviews.author: Rishabh Joshi

reviews.title: Didn\'t answer and viral ads
reviews.comment: please someone do this properly so I can screen my calls and pick some up etc
reviews.author: drj beney

reviews.title: two big problems
reviews.comment: 1. the answering machine uses the loud speaker with loud sound.  this is not usable in business meetings, classroom, hospitals, libraries, prayer places, sleeping areas, movie theaters, quiet areas, basically every place and every time you want to use the answering machine.   2. when I call someone, the recorded message will play out loud. definitely a bug.
reviews.author: Peter Lee Budi Banjarmasin

reviews.title: Thanks a lot
reviews.comment: Hi dear developer  Thanks for your very hopeful software.  Software have a big problem and it is when answering machine pick up a call run in speaker phone and this is very bad.  Second problem : don\'t have quick list for message recorded.  Please solve these.  Thanks again.
reviews.author: SMehdi R

reviews.title: Useful app with too many bugs
reviews.comment: 1).The caller is not able to hear the welcome message 2). There is too much of NOISE while in loud speaker mode.  Otherwise awesome app
reviews.author: Puneet Batra

reviews.title: Very invasive ads
reviews.comment: Nearly unusable: fullscreen ads every 5 seconds blocks application
reviews.author: G. Grundik

reviews.title: Brilliant idea, terrible execution
reviews.comment: The app records audio out loud - totally useless for taking messages when your phone is quiet!
reviews.author: Nick Syperek

reviews.title: Hopefully
reviews.comment: I love this apa If only my caller can hear my welcome message, and theres an option to choose whether incoming call routed to speaker phone or silently respond and record incoming call
reviews.author: tebegaya tampan

reviews.title: First anwering machine ever
reviews.comment: Very nice app 1st of its kind in play store only drawback is records on loudspeaker and hence rec quality is not nice whn there\'s noice in d background... please rectify that..
reviews.author: abdulkader najib

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing!  Makes voicemail, call divert, etc. all redundant!!!  Complete control over calls, missed calls, etc. right on your android phone!!!  Works flawlessly on my Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.  Would pay up to $9.99 for this amazing app!!!
reviews.author: Sam Sri Lanka

reviews.title: It does not work
reviews.comment: Hello, my name is Austin. I just download it and I tried using it. But I cannot use it. It is not being answered. How can I adjust the setting and use it the way it is meant to be used? Please help me. I am using Symphony W25, Andriod version Gingerbread 2.3.6. Thank you. And if you can please email me in austingomes220@gmail.com
reviews.author: Austin Gomes

reviews.title: Simple flaw
reviews.comment: People need an answering machine to take calls when they\'re in meetings or unable to answer. Why make your app broadcast the other person\'s voice message for every one else to hear?
reviews.author: Rohan George

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Its a perfect app if you want someone to spy on you at any time. It doesnt play the recorded msg and worst of all it doesn\'t mute the mic. So the caller can hear everything without us knowing.
reviews.author: Pratik Mohite

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Only saying I have one message but not playing what\'s my message is..
reviews.author: cherilyn mejos

reviews.title: So many complains
reviews.comment: Are you even fixing anything??? Look at all those complaints!
reviews.author: Aisha Hassan

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Searched everywhere for this app..only issue is I am not able to listen to the message the caller has left for me...it says there 1 message but I cant here anything else would have given 5...also add some pre-recorded...message dialogues...thx
reviews.author: Ankit Khanna

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Doesnt works. Its just waste of time.
reviews.author: Rohan Goyal

reviews.title: Nice Try need some more improvement
reviews.comment: team this is a very handy app but need below adjustment    1 - When the caller call me they cannot hear my welcome message (Andriod issue audio cannot transmitted via internal audio player app)  2 - the Voice clarity is very bad   3 - Interface very pixellated.    Please fix this and i will be the first one to buy your app. Cheers
reviews.author: tahir khan
